strength_details: Modern data stack (Spark, Kafka, Python, SQL)
Opportunities for continuous learning and skill development
Clear reporting structure to Head of Data Engineering
concern_details: ASAP start date suggests potential for time pressure
best_fit_details: Mid-level data engineers with 3-5 years of experience
Engineers proficient in building and maintaining data pipelines
Candidates with experience in cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
probe_details: Inquire about typical work hours and expectations for work-life balance
Ask about team turnover rates to gauge stability
Understand the current state of tech debt and plans for addressing it
leverage_details: Experience with specific industries or data domains relevant to IBM's clients
summary.overall_assessment: This is a solid opportunity for a mid-level data engineer seeking a well-defined role within a large, established tech company. The modern tech stack and clear reporting structure are positive indicators. The main trade-off is the potential for time pressure due to the ASAP start date.
